mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_ITEM_DTL ( BAR_CODE, SUPPLIER_CD, ITEM_NM, ITEM_TYPE_CD, PURCHASE_PRICE, CREATE_DT, UPDATE_DT ) VALUES ( #{barCode}, #{supplierCd}, #{itemNm}, #{itemTypeCd}, #{purchasePrice}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT BAR_CODE, SUPPLIER_CD, ITEM_NM, ITEM_TYPE_CD, PURCHASE_PRICE FROM T_ITEM_DTL WHERE 1=1 AND ITEM_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{itemNm}, '%')
